code:
sequenceDiagram
    autonumber
 
    participant Testsuite
    participant Ingress
    participant Testdriver
    participant TigerPDP as Tiger (Ingress?PDP)
    participant PDP
    participant TigerPEP as Tiger (Ingress?PEP)
    participant PEP as PEP Proxy
    participant TigerFD as Tiger (PEP?FD)
    participant FD as Fachdienst (FD)
 
    note over TigerPDP: Zeichnet Ingress ? PDP auf
    note over TigerPEP: Zeichnet Ingress ? PEP auf
    note over TigerFD: Zeichnet PEP ? FD auf
    note over Testdriver: Simuliert ZETA Client
 
    Testsuite->>Ingress: GET /proxy/hellozeta
    activate Testsuite
    activate Ingress
    Ingress->>Testdriver: GET /proxy/hellozeta
    activate Testdriver
 
    Testdriver->>Ingress: GET /authenticate
    Ingress->>TigerPDP: GET /auth/authenticate
    activate TigerPDP
    TigerPDP->>PDP: GET /authenticate
    activate PDP
    PDP-->>TigerPDP: 200
    deactivate PDP
    TigerPDP-->>Ingress: 200
    deactivate TigerPDP
    Ingress-->>Testdriver: 200
 
    Testdriver->>Ingress: GET /hellozeta
    Ingress->>TigerPEP: GET /hellozeta
    activate TigerPEP
    TigerPEP->>PEP: GET /hellozeta
    activate PEP
    PEP->>TigerFD: GET /testfachdienst/hellozeta
    activate TigerFD
    TigerFD->>FD: GET /hellozeta
    activate FD
    FD-->>TigerFD: 200
    deactivate FD
    TigerFD-->>PEP: 200
    deactivate TigerFD
    PEP-->>TigerPEP: 200
    deactivate PEP
    TigerPEP-->>Ingress: 200
    deactivate TigerPEP
    Ingress->>Testdriver: 200
    Testdriver-->>Ingress: 200
    deactivate Testdriver
    Ingress-->>Testsuite: 200
    deactivate Ingress
    deactivate Testsuite
